original_text: And the people stole into the city that day as people steal in who are ashamed when they flee in battle.
korean_text: 그 날에 백성들이 싸움에 쫓겨 부끄러워 도망함 같이 가만히 성읍으로 들어가니라

sentences.original_text: And the people stole into the city that day
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 백성은 그 날 몰래 성으로 들어갔습니다

sentences.original_text: as people steal in who are ashamed
